channel.title: InYourBones — Bay Area Radar (far_out)
channel.description: Curated upcoming Bay Area shows from InYourBones.

item.title: Waxahatchee @ The Masonic
item.description: 2026-05-06 02:30 — Waxahatchee at The Masonic. Waxahatchee is known for her poignant songwriting and strong live performances, making this a must-see show.

item.title: Florence + The Machine @ Chase Center
item.description: 2026-05-16 02:30 — Florence + The Machine at Chase Center. Florence + The Machine has a legendary live reputation, and their upcoming tour promises a captivating experience.

item.title: RUSH @ SAP Center at San Jose
item.description: 2026-10-16 02:30 → 2026-10-18 02:30 — RUSH at SAP Center at San Jose. RUSH's concerts are known for their elaborate performances, appealing to both long-time fans and new listeners.

item.title: Three Days Grace @ SAP Center at San Jose
item.description: 2026-11-19 03:00 — Three Days Grace at SAP Center at San Jose. Evanescence's powerful vocals and theatrical performances are a draw for rock fans.

item.title: Jack Johnson @ Greek Theatre-U.C. Berkeley
item.description: 2026-10-01 01:30 → 2026-10-02 01:30 — Jack Johnson at Greek Theatre-U.C. Berkeley. Jack Johnson's laid-back style and engaging live shows make this a great pick for fans of acoustic pop.

item.title: The Neighbourhood @ Bill Graham Civic Auditorium
item.description: 2026-10-08 02:30 — The Neighbourhood at Bill Graham Civic Auditorium. The Neighbourhood's atmospheric sound and strong live presence make this a compelling choice.

item.title: Joyce Manor @ The Fillmore
item.description: 2026-05-16 02:00 — Joyce Manor at The Fillmore. Joyce Manor's mix of punk and indie rock has garnered a dedicated following, ensuring a lively show.

item.title: St. Lucia @ August Hall
item.description: 2026-05-18 03:00 — St. Lucia at August Hall. St. Lucia's vibrant sound and engaging live performances make this a highly anticipated event.

item.title: Train @ Shoreline Amphitheatre
item.description: 2026-08-27 01:45 — Train at Shoreline Amphitheatre. Three Days Grace's hard rock sound and energetic shows appeal to a dedicated fanbase.

item.title: Seven Lions @ Bill Graham Civic Auditorium
item.description: 2026-05-31 02:30 — Seven Lions at Bill Graham Civic Auditorium. Childish Gambino's innovative music and dynamic performances promise a memorable experience.

item.title: Lucy Dacus @ The Castro Theatre
item.description: 2026-05-19 03:00 — Lucy Dacus at The Castro Theatre. Doja Cat's genre-blending style and high-energy performances are sure to attract a large audience.

item.title: Bob Moses @ Greek Theatre-U.C. Berkeley
item.description: 2026-07-18 02:30 — Bob Moses at Greek Theatre-U.C. Berkeley.
